response.job_title: Ingeniero mecánico | ingeniería de diseño | ingeniería de planeación | energías renovables
response.summary:
Ingeniero Mecánico, interesado en el transporte y el uso de materias primas y energía; como herramienta para el desarrollo sostenible de la sociedad. Interés particular en generación eléctrica por medios alternativos y optimización de recursos.

Conocimientos técnico en diseño y puesta en servicio de maquinas térmicas, turbomaquinas, transmisión de potencia. Habilidades en software CAD y competencias en AUTOLISP para programación a pedido del CAD.

Con experiencias de vida que permiten laborar en equipo, llevar a cabo proyectos y generar un sano y eficiente ambiente de trabajo.
response.skills: Dirección y desarrollo de equipos de trabajo, Análisis de datos, Capacidad de análisis, Servicio de atención al cliente, Administración logística, Español, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel, AutoCAD, Inglés, Ingeniería, Microsoft Word, Diseño asistido por ordenador (CAD), Desarrollo sostenible, Transmisión de potencia, Transporte, Autodesk Inventor

profile_positions.description: Coordinador del proceso de importación y almacenaje de estructura metálica para líneas de transmisión. Informes de seguimiento, coordinación de personal, reuniones con proveedores internacionales y JVR a medida.
profile_positions.title: Coordinador OL Latam

company.name: Consorcio Qutub Minar S.A.S
company.description: Consorcio Qutub Minar is a global inspection and logistics company that provides a range of services to clients around the world. We specialize in coordinating, programming, controlling and supervising all aspects of the design, manufacturing, testing, dispatching, tracking, and reception of materials. Our innovative logistics process offers predictability and efficiency to our clients, helping them to improve their productivity, reduce costs, and achieve success. We take a can-do approach to every project, and our passion for excellence sets us apart from other service providers in the industry. Our commitment to working with efficiency, transparency, and integrity is at the core of our business. We strive to maintain a trustworthy relationship with our clients, employees, and suppliers, interacting with them in a responsive and rapid way. We have the right combination of assets and expertise to work together around the world to ensure that our client's projects are completed with the highest level of efficiency and accuracy. We have extensive experience in coordinating, scheduling and supervising all the steps required in the process of manufacturing, dispatching, tracking, and receiving materials. Our services include supervising materials tests, checking and reviewing prototypes, approving manufacture and dispatch, and handling logistics for ground transportation, packaging, storage, and maritime transport. Our expertise has been put to the test in various international projects. For instance, we have manufactured and transported power transmission line structures for projects in Central and South America, and The Philippines. Structures were manufactured in Turkey, India, and China and then transported to various locations around the world. Choose Consorcio Qutub Minar for your next project and experience our commitment to excellence, efficiency, and innovation.
